course.title: ADM 3345 Taxation I (3 units)
course.desc: Provides a general knowledge of the Canadian Federal Income Tax system as it relates to individual taxpayers. The course includes the tax provisions for calculating all sources of taxpayer income to arrive at taxable income and the calculation of income taxes payable by an individual taxpayer.Course Component: LecturePrerequisite or Corequisite: ADM 3340.
